question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: Annual Street Maintenance, Bluffs Park Shade Structures, Birdview Avenue Improvements.
evidence_answer: Birdview Avenue Improvements, Bluffs Park Shade Structure, Annual Street Maintenance, PCH Median Improvements Project, City Hall Roof Replacement, Marie Canyon Green Streets
